title: Soros NGO closing Hungary office amid crackdown
text:
Soros NGO closing Hungary office amid crackdown 6:17pm IST - 01:07
George Soros' Open Society Foundations will close their office in Budapest and move to Berlin, leaving what it called an increasingly repressive political environment.
George Soros' Open Society Foundations will close their office in Budapest and move to Berlin, leaving what it called an increasingly repressive political environment. //in.reuters.com/video/2018/05/15/soros-ngo-closing-hungary-office-amid-cr?videoId=427075920&videoChannel=13423
